description: An action that displays a search text field with dynamic proposals when selected. Add a listener on *select* to implement the action. On *input*, you may set a list of *proposals*.

open.description: Invokes the search action, i.e. displays the ui to perform a search.

proposals.description: The list of proposals to display.

text.description: The text in the search input field.

message.description: A hint text that is displayed when the search input is empty.

accept.description: Fired when a text input has been submitted by pressing the keyboard's search key.
